Articles.Content: Please add comets to the stock game! It wouldn't just look awesome, but you could put them onto highly eccentric orbits! Also if, it would be nice because of the science (pressure data at different comet phases, surface samples, etc.)
By now quoting the 'What not to suggest' list is becoming quite a clichÃƒÂ©. But I am going to do it anyway: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest
even still, the more people that nag about it, the better as far as I'm concerned.
